item.title: How I Recovered My Kali + Windows Dual Boot After a BIOS Update Broke GRUB
item.description: A complete step-by-step guide to restoring GRUB after a BIOS update removes Kali Linux from boot menu. No data loss. Detailed troubleshooting walkthrough.
